com.app.model

Class BidDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.app.model.BidDAO

  • public class BidDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    The BidDAO which has all the methods that manages the bids.

        Returns:
        an ArrayList in the order specified

      • retrieveAllInOrder

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Bid> retrieveAllInOrder()
        retrieves the bids in order of code (ASC), section (ASC), amount (DESC)
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Bids with code (ASC) sorted first, section (ASC) sorted second and amount (DESC) sorted third

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Bid> retrieveBySectionIdInOrderOfAmount(java.lang.String courseId,
                                                          java.lang.String sectionId)
        Returns a ArrayList of bids in the "Sudden Death" round in order of descending bid amounts.
        Parameters:
        courseId - courseId of the course
        sectionId - sectionId of the section
        Returns:
        an ArrayList in descending order of the bids

      • retrieveBySectionIdInOrderOfAmountUserId

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Bid> retrieveBySectionIdInOrderOfAmountUserId(java.lang.String courseId,
                                                                java.lang.String sectionId)
        Retrieve by section. In order of userid(ASC) and bid amount (DESC)
        Parameters:
        courseId - the courseId of the course
        sectionId - the sectionId of the section
        Returns:
        an ArrayList in the order of userId and bid amount

        public static void addAll(java.util.ArrayList<Bid> bidList)

        Parameters:

      • emptyTable

        public static void emptyTable()
        1. "If there is no active round, the bids (whether successful or unsuccessful) for the most recently concluded round should be shown." 2. "The system does not need to maintain a history of bidding results from previous bidding rounds." Therefore, only to be executed upon the start of Round 2. All the successful bids are already transferred to section_student table.
